posts.postText:
Your In-Game name: [S3G] Darknighte9
Your Steam ID: STEAM_0:1:24815152
Reason: ""GTFO S3G PERMA""
Length of Ban/Date and Time of Unban: Permanently/ 6/2/11 - Around 9:30-10:00
What server were you playing?: [NNJG] TTT
Who banned you?: Not sure.. it happened too fast couldn't tell =/
Why should we unban you?: I understand their is quite a bit of tension between our clans and I do not understand alot of it myself. I love playing on your guys'' TTT server and I have not once been kicked or banned previously. I do not and never have issued any hate towards NNJG because of the clan I am in. I wish NNJG and all of its members the best throughout all of its servers. If I can not be unbanned all I ask is that I can get an explanation why I was banned because of the clan I was in. 

Thanks...
I was on when that happened, forgot who it was, It was a kick that said it was a Ban try joining.

Well this time it wasnt me just saying.... someone else stealing my kick/ban ways.

but yeah... it wasnt me, i wasnt even home when it happened
It was just a kick, can we get a forum mod/admin to lock this?

*Unlocking*

A user should never be kicked or banned just because of the group they're in (Unless that group has intentions that collide with our rules), I would like to know who did this.

I think Overclocking, but I could be wrong, I just made the comment that since he joined then immediately left and rejoined that he was stealing codes (Joking of course), but I also heard a rumor that anyone from S3G would be banned, I never Banned anyone because of it, but I have heard it going around.  Guess now I know it's false.

Well the best I remember as far as mods that were on was, overclocking, that guy, and i believe deth slayer may have been on as well but i'm not sure. I tried going back on again and some voice chatted "send him a message and a ban" (which was probably directed at me) ----then well... disconnected and i received the message as mentioned above.
Don't remember who banned, but a few people said he was one of the members that joined the server to steal code. Overclocking and That Guy were only mods on if i remember correctly.

Stop kicking people with the reason "Perma". 
I already said it wastes everybodies time.
